item.title: Version 2.0.1
item.description:
New addition:
1. Integrated sales module with Sales enquiry and order management.
2. Expense log for users that helps to keep track of all the business expenses on the go and at one place.
3. Schedule and organize all meetings in a hassle-free manner.
4. Reviewing calendar and sending alerts with notifications to members of the team.
Bug Fixes:
1. Few major bugs fixed related to company configs.
2. Pdf generation mechanism changes for better stability.
